sub_title: SVP Head of Treasury at Universal Music Group
summary:
Head of Treasury with over 20 years of experience in Entertainment industry. Extensive experience in risk management, organisational and process changes, corporate governance guidelines compliance, in a multi cultural environment.

Specialties: Responsibilities cover Bonds, CPs, Financing, Rating, FX strategy, treasury/tax planning, M&A closings, treasury integration, cash management,  bank relationships, tendering, project implementation and treasury reporting.
